items.title: Weather Conditions

If a hoist is to be used  - Wind speed checked to confirm within operating limits – anemometer (if available) used at ground level and observation for work position wind speed carried out from ground (Beaufort scale) record wind speed and observed Beaufort level.
Has the location been identified as a hot job?
Have any hazardous pipeline Markers/Posts been identified on site?
Is the Line search (Safe Dig Prints) older than 28 days?

enables.title: Line Search Out of Date Comment

falseEnables.title: Line Search Out of Date Comment

items.title: Is the work positioned outside of the Safe Dig Prints work area?
Are all control measures in place as detailed in the generic task risk assessment?
At least one operative holds the required NRSWA units for the work activity?
Traffic survey completed (including road width, traffic make up and volume) confirms minimum widths can be maintained (specify 1 or 2 way working)?
Are there hospitals, schools, clinics, shops, etc. in the vicinity of the works. Additional precautions required?
Protection for knuckle (when using a hoist on site; specifically PE8) considered in RWG set up?
Pedestrians; footpaths closed when working across footpath; barriered safe area protects whole site including  poles, when not on PEU, when not crossing footpath?
Can any open excavations be guarded effectively including spoil?
Is this area free from risk for the general public?
Have all utilities been identified and marked up onsite as per HSG47?
Do operatives onsite have the appropriate training or licences (IPAF) for all vehicles on site.
Equipment (including PEU/PE) checked before use, LOLER tests certificate/labels, general condition.
Ground conditions checked for safe operation
Inclinometer confirms PEU/Hoist within operating envelope.
All vehicles in use level across width i.e. doesn’t have one side up kerb.
Stability confirm operating surface Road/Pavement/private drive/un-metalled track/soft ground.
For soft ground what checks have been carried out to confirm stability of ground.
Comments
Service covers and underground structures 1mtr from stabilisers. If yes can PEU be repositioned to increase clearance.
Do existing overhead cables impact on safe working or use of plant?
Overhead obstructions for lifting operations and at Work Point considered ? – precautions understood by both operators.
Operators understand the work to be performed. Lifting plan lifting poles, raising/lifting wires and equipment discussed and understood by everyone involved.
Is there an adequate safety zone in place for any lifting operations?
Is all Plant being used for excavating or lifting appropriate for use and stabilised as per manufacture's instructions?
Is there Overhead power in vicinity?
HV within 25m – exclusion zone marked appropriate for power level
LV within 25m – refer to overhead power glovebox guide
CAT & Genny calibration in date and available in good working order?
Is all the relevant PPE/Equipment available for use in good condition?
Is specialist PPE required?
Insulated tools & flame retardant clothing/PPE worn while excavating?
Water suppression equipment and FFP3 dust mask available?
Are all operatives aware of the risk assessment and the controls for vibrating equipment?
For D pole work all members of the team understand support methods to be used while de-loading pole?
Will the works adversely affect overhead wires crossing a road?

enables.title: Hoist Risk Assessment - Will Works Adversely Affect Overhead Wires

falseEnables.title: Hoist Risk Assessment - Will Works Adversely Affect Overhead Wires

items.title: Will the works require accessing a Joint User Pole – if yes Joint User Pole Risk Assessment pad completed?
Verbal and visual communication can be maintained at all times?
Is there a means of cleaning hands onsite?
Are spill kits and instructed operative available onsite?
Are there any other environmental issues?
Have any risks, outside the Generic Risk Assessments been identified?
Have the conclusions of this Risk assessment and the methods of working required by it been  briefed to all gang members and fully understood?
